main.name: Angela Tooley
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Hi there!  My name is Angela, and I am a creative and detail-oriented Front-End Developer. I recently earned a certificate in Full Stack Web Development from the University of Connecticut, where I developed skills in CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and responsive web design. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration from Texas Tech University, and most recently I worked as a Therapeutic Recreation Director in long-term care. When I’m not coding, I enjoy reading, running, crafting, and spending time with my toddler son, Owen.

education.degree: Full Stack Web Developer Boot Camp Certificate

work.title: Therapeutic Recreation Director/Recreation Assistant
work.description: Created and managed several recreational programs for residents every week. Performed assessments of resident recreational needs and accomplishments.
